list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hand tool, power tool, or machine with a rotating cutting tip or reciprocating hammer or chisel, used for making holes.
instruction or training in military exercises.
a predatory mollusk that bores into the shells of other mollusks in order to feed on the soft tissue.
a machine that makes small furrows, sows seed in them, and then covers the sown seed.
a dark brown baboon with a short tail and a naked blue or purple rump, found in the rainforests of West Africa.
a coarse twilled cotton or linen fabric.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: sturdy clothes in drill, denim and linen
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Quần áo chắc chắn trong khoan, denim và vải lanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: produce (a hole) in something by or as if by boring with a drill.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: drill holes through the tiles for the masonry pins
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: khoan lỗ thông qua các viên gạch cho các chân xây

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a sergeant was drilling new recruits
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một trung sĩ đã khoan các tân binh mới
